hiveArticle.title: A trip to Bali Captured
hiveArticle.body:
A life time experience of Bali is captured beautifully through this post. If you have been to Bali, please comment your experience .

**Fly High**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdYi51G9gWJ9n7VQiwveXDr3x2UeipvvA1KC5Qw6VGPix/image.png)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWKmPrkv9hLwSFgUM6pJMmfNVzanaCFKWp2kGfo5viTdk/image.png)

**Batur**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSxMFzrQfuaVBVMuTt2R2mgVUAGgAbusAyH7RYLUXTJp9/image.png)

**Beautiful Sunset as usual**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQit7adKG6DbAWU5eXDKypPn1Pw2qrBcQojex3rtoYrjz/image.png)

**WOW waters or Beach or Rock as you call it**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQixhksm2CEQ6rA83BZhFzWouz4WbM3gFF7NbxPvoAvg5/image.png)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRgrWpfg3iHHytU1AFiyw8Qp5W3DpMa1EWFehpYGTXeYU/image.png)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWBUFy9L455ZTd9ALyyKTZj7p7ED7Rzj8E2FVo2cfPECv/image.png)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmeqqe4sgFDd8z3Hb65TXXEVL1k5ru2qziNXDjMRjYRGja/image.png)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcnyyNVaW9iusVJpTsA8NyZe7RcCd5spbRQ7jXiSAzF43/image.png)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcm9oWLhk3unm5RhcwnAih73DDtuoV1J4AitFwwYNBu8z/image.png)

**Hide in the cloud if you can**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUu9Ev5Di7jQXDVNRzyVF9pdM4J3SQosvwfXdzByyBjp9/image.png)

**Night is as beautiful as morning**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmY2119bYP8HPTQKCFm5uBctNYs3zWFN3qWpRrcsJ2xxfQ/image.png)

** Some Random**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTHP7ddiib237btyKeWnLa5Anc7tUKPamw7Yt5bsg9wAp/image.png)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmfNsmiZhiZq4EZJzwkc1H6ihkhyzq5n14hzDjVuZZWPAs/image.png)

Hope you liked it. Liked it Upvote it, if not comment it.
